alert.note: Alert for Greenville Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania and northwestern Greenville Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Brevard, or 5 miles northwest of Caesars Head State Park, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caesars Head State Park, Connestee and Cedar Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
